it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller.effects.selection

Interface PlayerSelector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnyPlayerSelector, BlackListFilterPlayerSelector, DirectionalPlayerSelector, IntersectPlayerSelector, NearPlayerSelector, NegatedPlayerSelector, SameTilePlayerSelector, UnionPlayerSelector, VisiblePlayerSelector, WhileListFilterPlayerSelector
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface PlayerSelector
    The player selector is a logical predicate that can discriminate players by different criteria. Usually criteria include information about players relative locations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isSelectable(Map map, Player player)
      Method used to check whether the player meets the condition of the selector.

    • Method Detail

      • isSelectable

        boolean isSelectable(Map map,
                     Player player)
        Method used to check whether the player meets the condition of the selector.
        Parameters:
        map - context of the selector.
        player - the Player object that should be checked by this selector.
        Returns:
        whether the player meets the condition of the selector.
